message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think it's a great deal and will be very useful for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we meet at $145? I really think that's the most I can do.
